Mass. reports zero new coronavirus deaths for the first time in monthsFor the first time in months, state officials on Tuesday reported no new deaths in Massachusetts due to the deadly coronavirus, an encouraging sign that stands in stark contrast to other states around the country. All four key metrics that the state is monitoring to determine the pace of reopening also fell.
The latest COVID-19 numbers from Massachusetts
Key metrics in Massachusetts

Actual number of COVID-19 cases is 12 times higher than reported, with 50 percent more deaths, says MIT studyThe researchers contend that a swifter response to the pandemic could have prevented one-third of all fatalities.

Mass. reports zero new coronavirus deaths for the first time in monthsFor the first time in months, state officials on Tuesday reported no new deaths in Massachusetts due to the deadly coronavirus, an encouraging sign that stands in stark contrast to other states around the country. All four key metrics that the state is monitoring to determine the pace of reopening also fell.
The latest COVID-19 numbers from Massachusetts
